thread.title: Brady, Patriots take advantage of botched punt to beat Indy
thread.title_full: Brady, Patriots take advantage of botched punt to beat Indy

title: Brady, Patriots take advantage of botched punt to beat Indy
text:
> Top News Brady, Patriots take advantage of botched punt to beat Indy New England Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski (87) pushes away from Indianapolis Colts free safety Dwight Lowery (33) on his way to a touchdown in the second half of an NFL football game in Indianapolis, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/John Minchillo) Search Help
